The Black Heart

miscellaneous (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 356
morale bonus [morale]: +2
restriction [cannotwear]: cannot be worn by inanimate units
assassin [assassin]: 1
(unremovable [cursed], won't-be-picked-up [nofind], applies-chest-wound [chestwound])

Requires 10B to forge (B2)

By replacing their original heart with this one, the owner of the Black Heart will receive the skills and morals needed to be a professional assassin. The heart can only be used by stealthy beings. The crude surgery required to replace hearts will most likely permanently damage its owner. One being can have multiple magic hearts at once. Inanimate beings cannot use magic hearts.
